meanings.definition: A small, nocturnal, arboreal marsupial native to Australia and New Guinea.
meanings.sent1: The phalangers are cute animals that live in trees and come out at night.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of phalangers climbing in the trees while on a nature walk.
meanings.sent3: The phalangers decided to have a nighttime party in the treetops.
meanings.sent4: The phalangers' eyes glowed in the darkness as they moved gracefully through the branches.
meanings.sent5: The tiny phalangers leaped from tree to tree, their fluffy tails trailing behind them.

meanings.definition: Any member of the family Phalangeridae, including the cuscuses and brushtail possums.
meanings.sent1: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring various phalangers from the Phalangeridae family.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of phalangers to learn more about their family, Phalangeridae.
meanings.sent3: The Phalangeridae family reunion was a lively event with all the phalangers present.
meanings.sent4: The Phalangeridae family tree is filled with diverse phalangers of different species.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the Phalangeridae family of phalangers playfully chase each other among the trees.
